TopicTitle: Stock and custom flags missing from flag selection menu

Articles.Content:
Pretty much in the title, in the flag selection menu when starting a new game / clicking on the flag pole at the KSC, only the manufacturer's flags appear, with the other stock flags and all custom flags missing. Have checked the flags folder and they are all there in the files. Any help appreciated.

 

LOGFILE: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PcPt5f6Pp9p20vYzxKWBZAyXcYsa_uh_/view?usp=drive_link

MODS INSTALLED:

Edited June 16 by saltywalrusprkl
put details at top

FIXED!

After tinkering with my game files for a bit, I discovered it was caused by my KSP instance folder having a "+" in the name. So uh, don't do that.
